constructor-arg.value: SELECT t1.id, t1.name name_rus, t1.name_original name_eng, t1.release_year year, t1.rating, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t3.name ORDER BY t3.id DESC SEPARATOR ',') genres FROM movie t1 LEFT JOIN movie_genre t2 ON t1.id = t2.movie_id LEFT JOIN genre t3 ON t2.genre_id = t3.id GROUP BY t1.id, t1.name, t1.name_original, t1.release_year, t1.rating;
